Collection highlight

We love to hear from you

Over 3,000 pieces dating back to 2.4 million years ago

The museum's collections are very rich, there are pieces from prehistory, antiquity, Islamic arts and numismatics. Thus, one can discover sets of archaeological remains, most of which date back to Roman times, from excavations carried out in Sitives, Qal'at Bani Hammad and Jamila.
